name: Distract the zombie
description:
Distract the zombie and steal the key to open the chest! 

Use the players to draw the zombie towards one of them while the others try to steal the key.

Controls:

  • Point and click on the map to move the character to the location that has been clicked.
  • Press from 1 to 4 on the keyboard to select which character you want to move. 

Source control link: 

https://bitbucket.org/RodrigoRoldan/sfasx/src/master/
